description.narrative: As part of this Project, IFC seeks to support the acceleration of Growsaris growth plans throughout the Philippines and anticipates that the Project Outcomes are Very Strong, derived from increased access to supply chain for informal retailers, with the potential to result in improved efficiency. Most retailers on the platform are expected to be informal and run by women, qualifying the Project as an Inclusive and Gender Business. Beyond the Project, the Contribution to Market Creation is Strong, aiming to substantially strengthen the integration of the retail value chain in the Philippines through digitalization, via demonstration and replication channels. A successful expansion by the Company is expected to demonstrate the viability of this business model, thereby triggering replication by new entrants and traditional players, and therefore promoting faster digitalization of retail supply chains, beyond the Company. Integration (i) Increased integration of the retail value chain in the Philippines through digitalization, via demonstration and replication channels. The Philippine retail value chain, which entails a B2B segment from manufacturers, distributors, and wholesalers to retailers; and a B2C segment from retailers to consumers, remains underdeveloped due to significant frictions in the B2B segment arising from the presence of multiple middlemen and fragmentation.

Growsari (GS or the Company) is a digital retail distribution platform connecting informal SME retailers (a.k.a. sari-sari stores) to fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) manufacturers/wholesalers. Growsari is digitizing the FMCG supply chain in the Philippines and more efficiently matching large suppliers with fragmented demands.

mailing-address.narrative: Growsari Samantha Chua Investor Relations Manager +63 76-116-3854 sam.chua@growsari.com 2nd Floor, Robinsons Zeta Tower, C-5, Quezon City, Metro Manila, Philippines https://growsari.com/

name.narrative: The Company is registered in Singapore and headquartered in Quezon City, Philippines.
